extends java.lang.Object
    helper class to build a Vector and a scalar from String

    liort

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MutableInteger createScalar(java.lang.String line)
      Receives a String representing an integer and returns a MutableInteger
      containing the value as integer
      Vector createVector(java.lang.String line)
      Receives a comma delimited String where each value represents an integer
      and returns a new Vector holding each value as an integer

                    throws VectorException
        Receives a comma delimited String where each value represents an integer
        and returns a new Vector holding each value as an integer
